fixes.name: [Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs] / TOTAL([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD) Abs])
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Numerator = ABS(SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]))
VAR Denominator = CALCULATE(ABS(SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])), ALL('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'))
RETURN DIVIDE(Numerator, Denominator, 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Reproduced the Tableau expression by computing the row/partition sum as ABS(SUM(...)) and using CALCULATE(..., ALL(table)) as the DAX equivalent of Tableau's TOTAL(...) to get the table-level total; finally used DIVIDE for safe division.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses TOTAL (a table calculation) and ABS(SUM(...)), which are aggregate/context-based operations, so this must be created as a measure.
